channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Shield Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Shield Security

item.title: CVE-2024-7313|2024-08-26T06:00:03.119Z -- unknown -- shield%20security
item.description: The Shield Security WordPress plugin before 20.0.6 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin.
